item.description:
Comment from Alice (organizer).

Michelle suggested this Meetup. Thanks for activating, Michelle. I've procrastinated!

We'll introduce ourselves and our situations, and see what follows. I'll bring a book I've used called "Organizing from the Inside Out" and say a few words about it as a conversation stimulator if we need one.Â I always hope for our members, including myself, to find buddies to help them get started and stay on track. I know I always learn something from the conversation. And usually have a few laughs.

The meeting will last until we get kicked out or drift off. Usually our meetings last about 1.5 to 2 hours. They work best if we get there on time so everyone is in on the conversation.

I've limited the RSVPs to 10 this time because the venue is small. There is a waiting list. You'll be emailed if someone cancels and then get a chance to RSVP. Members can bring a guest.

Michelle's original:

I think we should meet soon. People need the support of others. Summer is a great time to clean and do those jobs we dont want to do. THere is more time in the summer , the weather is beautiful (open those windows). We could meet at the library, a room in a building (church ect) a park. anywhere . Lets just do it,

I dont know where you met in the past. I am new and just signed up.
item.how_to_find_us: Panera is in the RK shopping center that houses Hannaford. Panera is toward Office Max. We'll have a sign saying MWPC
item.name: Lets meet on Wed., July 18th
